objects.description: [Black Basta](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1070) has modified the Registry to enable itself to run in safe mode, to change the icons and file extensions for encrypted files, and to add the malware path for persistence.(Citation: Minerva Labs Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: Cyble Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: Trend Micro Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: NCC Group Black Basta June 2022)(Citation: Deep Instinct Black Basta August 2022)(Citation: Palo Alto Networks Black Basta August 2022)
